name: Lucid Lacrimosa EP. 1
description:
LUCID LACRIMOSA A cyberpunk interactive fiction series EPISODE 1: THE HOLE

Welcome to the Hole:
A sprawling encampment at the base of a towering glass skyscraper.
A place where cranks, weirdos, and people who couldn't make it in the corporate System wind up.
A place where nothing and no one are what they seem.

You are Luce, a former cyber-mod hacker who's fallen on hard times.
You just want a break from it all—to forget about the past and the people you left behind.
But be careful what you wish for.

---

Play time: 5-10 minutes
New episodes will be added weekly
